MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Hartford, Cuddington, Sandiway, Gorstage and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damage caused to equipment on the overhead line network. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:00PM on 11th March 2021
